discourse_list.title: $DAI Base Pair added on Bitrue Soon!

content.content: $DAI will be the base pair with 70+ coins on Bitrue.com, we sincerely hope $DAI widely covered by more and more CEX to see the influence of decentralized $DAI rather than $USDT, $USDC these centralized assets, $DAI cap will rank 1st one day and How do you like the news abt $DAI with Bitrue?

I find it incredible, that has always been a recurring problem for DAI, its liquidity. Ah, despite having more than 9 billion DAI in circulation, the problem has always come from where can I change it? without having to spend network commissions. Amazing, I like this formal step for DAI and its ecosystem.
I think it’s great that they are betting on a decentralized currency such as DAI, that’s the way forward, the future that should be promoted and massified to reach everyone.

ZK-Rollups will take away a lot of headaches with Dai, and many other things, in the long run the layer 2 that will prevail in the first place are the Zero-Knowledge Rollups despite being more complex and difficult to implement, let’s focus more on that.
This topic was automatically closed 30 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
